com.pb.locationintelligence.geosearch

Interface GeoSearchService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeoSearchServiceImpl

    public interface GeoSearchService
    This service provides local search capabilities into your apps and services. It provides both independent and neutral local search information based on the input of search text and location coordinate w.r.t requested Address or Latitude-Longitude.

    • Method Detail

      • geoSearch

        void geoSearch(android.content.Context context,
             java.lang.String searchText,
             java.lang.Double originLatitude,
             java.lang.Double originLongitude,
             RequestObserver<GeoSearch> requestObserver)
        Retrieves Geo Search results
        Parameters:
        context - activity context
        searchText - Mandatory - The input to be searched
        originLatitude - Mandatory - The latitude of the location
        originLongitude - Mandatory - The longitude of the location
        requestObserver - Mandatory - Asynchronous request observer

      • geoSearch

        void geoSearch(android.content.Context context,
             java.lang.String searchText,
             java.lang.Double originLatitude,
             java.lang.Double originLongitude,
             java.lang.Float searchRadius,
             java.lang.String searchRadiusUnit,
             java.lang.Integer maxCandidates,
             RequestObserver<GeoSearch> requestObserver)
        Retrieves Geo Search results
        Parameters:
        context - activity context
        searchText - Mandatory - The input to be searched
        originLatitude - Mandatory - The latitude of the location
        originLongitude - Mandatory - The longitude of the location
        searchRadius - Optional - The radius from the given co-ordinates in which to search for results.
        searchRadiusUnit - Optional - Unit used for searchRadius.The acceptable unit values are: Feet, Kilometres, Miles and Meters. The searchRadiusUnit is optional, if not provided; the �Feet� value is taken by default. The specified values are case-insensitive.
        maxCandidates - Optional - Maximum number of results to return
        requestObserver - Mandatory - Asynchronous request observer
